trans-unit.source: Maintains the registration of all access keys and the handling of interop keyboard commands between Windows Forms, Win32, and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
trans-unit.target: Mantém o registro de todas as chaves de acesso e a manipulação de comandos de teclado de interoperabilidade entre Windows Forms, Win32 e WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> object is created on demand with one per <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> objeto é criado sob demanda com um por <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> is attached as an event handler for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> and exposes methods to <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Register%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Unregister%2A> access keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> for anexado como um manipulador de eventos <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> e expõe métodos para <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Register%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.Unregister%2A> chaves de acesso.

trans-unit.source: When the registered access key is pressed, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> calls the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A> method on the target element.
trans-unit.target: Quando a chave de acesso registrado é pressionada, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> chama o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A> método no elemento de destino.

trans-unit.source: An element can be associated with any number of access keys.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento pode ser associado a qualquer número de chaves de acesso.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> que escuta esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador ao evento anexado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" />.

trans-unit.source: The presentation source to query for <c>key</c>.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de apresentação para consultar a <c>chave</c>.

trans-unit.source: The key to query.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser consultada.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified key is registered as an access keys in the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a chave especificada é registrada como uma chave de acesso no escopo especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key is registered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a chave estiver registrada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The scope for the access key.
trans-unit.target: O escopo para a chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: A chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: Indicates if <c>key</c> has multiple matches.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a <c>chave</c> tem várias correspondências.

trans-unit.source: Processes the specified access keys as if a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event for the key was passed to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Processa as chaves de acesso especificadas como se um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> da chave tivesse sido passado para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there are more keys that match; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se houver mais chaves correspondentes, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: A chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The element to associate <c>key</c> with.
trans-unit.target: O elemento ao qual associar a <c>chave</c>.

trans-unit.source: Associates the specified access keys with the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Associa as chaves de acesso especificadas ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: When the access keys is pressed, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A> method of `element` is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando as chaves de acesso é pressionado, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnAccessKey%2A> método `element` é chamado.

trans-unit.source: An element can be associated with any number of access keys.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento pode ser associado a qualquer número de chaves de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> que escuta esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> event handler from the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Remove o manipulador de eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> especificado do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: A chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The element from which to disassociate <c>key</c>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual dissociar a <c>chave</c>.

trans-unit.source: Disassociates the specified access keys from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Desassocia as chaves de acesso especificadas do elemento especificado.
